text:
January 12, 1955
Mr, Morris S. Novik
300 West 23rd Street
Room 500
New York 11, N. Y.
Dear Morrie*
Yes, please send Schooley copies of all your notes to me. I*ve
shown him everything, but it would save time. Had intended to
reply on this earlier, but apparently forgot.
We* 11 be seeing Taylor in Chicago tomorrow. Will check then
on developments with Thompson. Will keep all this quiet* only
Schooley, Taylor and I will be in on any question.
Sincerely,
HJSjcr
CC* Schooley
Harry J, Skornia
Executive Director
